titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1084) to address slow economic growth and spur investment and development in underserved communities across America.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1084) to address slow economic growth and spur investment and development in underserved communities across America.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Ms. Lujan Grisham, M.Petition No: 115-5.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1084) to address slow economic growth and spur investment and development in underserved communities across America.
